details.msg: [LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Unnecessary complexity with structured output (SQLQuery BaseModel) and confidence scoring when expert uses simple string-based SQL generation', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Complex conditional routing logic with should_execute_sql function when expert uses simple linear pipeline', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue="Custom ChinookDatabase class wrapper adds unnecessary abstraction layer compared to expert's direct SQLDatabase usage", severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Overly complex state management with multiple fields (sql_result, final_answer) when expert uses simpler approach', severity='minor'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Verbose schema extraction with sample data when expert uses more concise approach', severity='minor')]
